Basil Project API Documentation

Documentation for the various modules of the Basil project.

  • basil: the main Basil package.
  • basil-antlr: ANTLR components for BAP/GTIRB parsing.
  • basil-proto: Protobuffer components for the Grammatech GTIRB format.
  • bnfc: BNFC/ANTLR components for Basil IR parsing.
